data.text: Ao Awurade, wo mu na me dwane hinta;
Wo tenenee no enti, yi me na gye me;
Yɛ me nkwagyeɛ botan
Ao me Onyankopɔn, gye me firi amumuyɛfoɔ nsam,
Na woayɛ mʼanidasoɔ, Ao Asafo Awurade,
Ɛfiri awoɔ mu, mede me ho ato wo so;
Mayɛ nhwɛsodeɛ ama bebree,
Wo nkamfo ahyɛ mʼanom ma,
Nto me ntwene ɛberɛ a mabɔ akɔkoraa;
Ɛfiri sɛ mʼatamfoɔ kasa tia me
Wɔka sɛ, “Onyankopɔn agya no mu;
Ao Onyankopɔn, mfiri me nkyɛn nkɔ akyiri;
Ma wɔn a wɔbɔ me soboɔ no nsɛe animguaseɛ mu;
Nanso me deɛ, mɛnya anidasoɔ daa;
Mɛka wo tenenee ho asɛm,
Ao Otumfoɔ Awurade, mɛba abɛpae mu aka wo nnwuma akɛseɛ no;
Ao Onyankopɔn, ɛfiri mʼababunu berɛ na wokyerɛkyerɛɛ me,
Mpo sɛ mebɔ akɔkoraa na mefu dwono a,
Ao Onyankopɔn, wo tenenee duru sorosoro,
Mmom woama mahunu ɔhaw bebree a ɛyɛ yea;
Wobɛhyɛ me animuonyam bebree
Mede sankuo bɛkamfo wo
Mʼanofafa de anigyeɛ bɛteam
Me tɛkrɛma bɛka wo tenenee nnwuma
